Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB: 87th, State, 83rd, Holland, and 87th; EB: 87th, Holland, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th near 87th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 87th/Lafayette, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, State, 83rd, Holland, and 87th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, Holland, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Washington/Wabash
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Wacker and Michigan: due to, street blockage near Washington/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Wacker and Michigan: due to, street blockage near Washington/Wabash.

Southbound buses are not affected.
